body: See https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/15385 . I verified OpenBLAS 0.3.9 now installs on intel%18 and 0.2.20 installs on my mac. I also changed the mixed-case `consistentFPCSR` variant name to `consistent_fpcsr` as per https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/15239 .
title: Fix OpenBLAS 0.2 build, 0.38+ Intel builds, and variant name
